text:
Robert Remus (born August 27, 1948, in Parris Island, South Carolina) better known by his ring name, Sgt. Slaughter, is a retired American professional wrestler that is best known for wrestling for E under the ring name Sgt. Slaughter.
He is a one-time WWF Champion and was inducted into the WWE Hall of Fame in 2004 by Pat Patterson.
His finishing move was the Camel clutch and then the Cobra clutch.
